Analytics

ITD112 Project
Discover More
Table of Contents

We created a website that shows dengue information from 2016 to 2021. This website will use storytelling techniques to make the data easy to understand and interesting. The goal is to present the dengue information in a clear and engaging way through charts, graphs, and visuals on this web page called a dashboard. Click me to visit !

We gathered information about floods, including where they happened using latitude and longitude. Then, we created different maps to show this data in three ways: one that shades areas based on flood intensity (choropleth), another that connects affected areas (connection map), and a third that marks specific spots where floods occurred (dot map). Click me to visit !

We came across a really useful dataset that's important for the community right now. It's all about heart health and cholesterol levels, which are things that affect people's well-being and are really relevant today. Click me to visit !
